text:
Senior Software Engineer | www.deswik.com | Brisbane, Australia| Salary: Negotiable | ONSITE

Looking for a talented engineer for a primarily C# based role working on schedule optimization software for various mining applications. Someone with a strong aptitude for working with complex algorithms and data structures would be ideal.

"Creative Fridays" where you can work on your own mad-scientist ideas.

Fun/social work environment and culture. Top-notch CBD location.

http://www.seek.com.au/job/31459693
